subject: literacy
learning_outcomes: Read simple sentences aloud with appropriate pacing and expression
Decode common words using phonics (including digraphs and blends)
Write simple sentences using basic punctuation (capital letters and full stops)
Retell short stories in correct sequence and answer basic comprehension questions
Increase vocabulary related to everyday life and school contexts
Participate in short spoken presentations or role plays on familiar topics
Use letter-sound knowledge to spell simple words accurately
Recognise basic parts of speech (nouns, verbs, adjectives) in simple contexts
topics: Reading: simple stories, sight words, reading for meaning
Writing: sentence formation, handwriting, basic punctuation
Listening and speaking: classroom discussions, retelling, role play
Vocabulary building: everyday words, classroom language
